'''Patrick Molloy''' ( born 13 January 1970 ) is an Irish actor who has worked in television, filmÂ and on stage. He had his first acting role in 1990 with a Theatre company and went on to perform with them for two years. He then went onto to perform in Dublinâ€™s well known Abbey Theatre and realized the acting bug had truly bitten. He took a break from the industry for a prolonged period before returning in 2007.

He joined the Gaiety School of acting and completed the advanced performance year focusing on the Stanislavski method, receiving a high accolade from his tutor on completion. Patrick went on to train with the Irish Film Actors Studio developing his skills for camera and he then decided to focus his career mainly in Film and Television.Â 

He plays a [[Night's Watch]] Ranger in [[Season 4]].
